definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

pinyin: zhen4 wang2 zhan4 shi4 ji4 nian4 ri4

sentences.english: Captain Aoyagi, the company commander, was killed while he directed the defense.
sentences.chinese: 連隊指揮官，青柳上尉，在直接參加防禦戰時陣亡。

sentences.english: Over 4,000 men who had sailed aboard Yamato and its escorts were dead.
sentences.chinese: 大和號及其護航艦上超過4000名船員陣亡。

sentences.english: They sent it to the Australian War Memorial for analysis.
sentences.chinese: 他們把金屬送到澳大利亞陣亡將士紀念館做分析。

sentences.english: Dependents of servicemen killed in action could also use the benefits.
sentences.chinese: 陣亡軍人的被撫養人也可享用這些福利。

sentences.english: They buried the victims where they fell.
sentences.chinese: 他們把這些犧牲者埋葬在他們陣亡的地方。

sentences.english: Women do bravely serve, and die, in combat in Iraq and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 婦女勇敢地做服役，在伊拉克和阿富汗的作戰中陣亡。

sentences.english: In fact he's probably K. I. A.
sentences.chinese: 事實上他很有可能已經陣亡了。

sentences.english: When the major was killed the senior captain took command of the company.
sentences.chinese: 當少校陣亡時，全連由資格較老的上尉指揮。

sentences.english: With their commander gone, the remainder of the Burning Legion's army was cast into disarray.
sentences.chinese: 指揮官陣亡，燃燒軍團的餘黨作鳥獸散。

sentences.english: In the battle, besides Mailuolinke, team is other the member is full be killed in battle.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥中，除了邁羅林克外，小隊其他成員全部陣亡。

sentences.english: There were alot of dead and wounded everywhere and alot of the groups were dragging and carrying wounded.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是陣亡者和傷者，許多人正在擡運傷者。

sentences.english: The fallen soldiers were eulogized as heroes.
sentences.chinese: 陣亡的士兵被頌揚爲英雄。

sentences.english: The body count seems to go down during the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 在雨季陣亡的人數似乎有所下降。

sentences.english: Ancient fair ruin and the cenotaph of officers and soldiers fall in battle etc.
sentences.chinese: 古市集，廢墟及陣亡將士紀念碑等。

sentences.english: Yes it was, but on the second day, only 18, 000 were killed.
sentences.chinese: 是的，可第二天，只有一萬八千人陣亡了。

sentences.english: This is the war in Afghanistan a decade the largest number of U. S. troops killed a single one.
sentences.chinese: 這是阿富汗戰爭十年來美軍單次陣亡人數最多的一次。

definition: Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)
to besiege/to beleaguer/to attack from all sides/to jointly speak or write against sb
